verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5375>take<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> you, even a <S%H7015>lamentation,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> she shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H6965>rise:<s%> she is <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> on her <S%H127>land;<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6965>raise<s%> her up.

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> The <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H3318>went<s%> out by a <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and that which <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> by an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> <S%H6235>ten,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1875>Seek<s%> you me, and you shall <S%H2421>live:<s%>

But <S%H1875>seek<s%> not <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> not to <S%H884>Beersheba:<s%> for <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> shall surely go into <S%H1540>captivity,<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to <S%H205>nothing.<s%>

<S%H1875>Seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and you shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H6743>break<s%> out like <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> it, and there be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3518>quench<s%> it in <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>
You who <S%H2015>turn<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and <S%H5117>leave<s%> off <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%>

Seek him that <S%H6213>makes<s%> the <S%H3598>seven<s%> <S%H3598>stars<s%> and <S%H3685>Orion,<s%> and <S%H2015>turns<s%> the <S%H6757>shadow<s%> of <S%H6757>death<s%> into the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and makes the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2821>dark<s%> with <S%H3915>night:<s%> that <S%H7121>calls<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H8210>pours<s%> them out on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H8034>name:<s%>

That <S%H1082>strengthens<s%> the <S%H7701>spoiled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5794>strong,<s%> so that the <S%H7701>spoiled<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4013>fortress.<s%>
They <S%H8130>hate<s%> him that <S%H3198>rebukes<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and they <S%H8581>abhor<s%> him that <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H8549>uprightly.<s%>

For as <S%H3282>much<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> as your <S%H1318>treading<s%> is on the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and you <S%H3947>take<s%> from him <S%H4864>burdens<s%> of <S%H1250>wheat:<s%> you have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H1496>hewn<s%> <S%H1496>stone,<s%> but you shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in them; you have <S%H5193>planted<s%> <S%H2531>pleasant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> but you shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> of them.

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H7227>manifold<s%> transgressions <S%H6588><s%>and your <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H2403>sins:<s%> they <S%H6887>afflict<s%> the <S%H6662>just,<s%> they <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3724>bribe,<s%> and they <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H34>poor<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> from their right.
<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> the <S%H7919>prudent<s%> shall keep <S%H1826>silence<s%> in that <S%H6256>time;<s%> for it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

<S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and not <S%H7451>evil,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live:<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> shall be with you, as you have <S%H559>spoken.<s%>

<S%H8130>Hate<s%> the <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H3322>establish<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate:<s%> it may be that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will be <S%H2587>gracious<s%> to the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H136>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3541>thus;<s%> <S%H4553>Wailing<s%> shall be in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7339>streets;<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2351>highways,<s%> <S%H1930>Alas!<s%> <S%H1930>alas!<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H406>farmer<s%> to <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and such as are <S%H3045>skillful<s%> of <S%H5092>lamentation<s%> to <S%H4553>wailing.<s%>
And in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> shall be <S%H4553>wailing:<s%> for I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> you, <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to you that <S%H183>desire<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD!<s%> to <S%H4100>what<s%> end is it for you? the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and not <S%H216>light.<s%>

As <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H5127>flee<s%> from a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H6293>met<s%> him; or <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5564>leaned<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and a <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5391>bit<s%> him.
Shall not the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and not <S%H216>light?<s%> even <S%H651>very<s%> <S%H651>dark,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5051>brightness<s%> in it?
I <S%H8130>hate,<s%> I <S%H3988>despise<s%> your <S%H2282>feast<s%> days, and I will not <S%H7306>smell<s%> in your <S%H6116>solemn<s%> <S%H6116>assemblies.<s%>

<S%H3588>Though<s%> <S%H518><s%> you <S%H5927>offer<s%> me <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings <S%H4503><s%>and your meat offerings, I will not <S%H7521>accept<s%> them: <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H5027>regard<s%> the <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings of your <S%H4806>fat<s%> <S%H4806>beasts.<s%>
<S%H5493>Take<s%> you <S%H5493>away<s%> from me the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of your <S%H7892>songs;<s%> for I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H2172>melody<s%> of your <S%H5035>viols.<s%>
But let <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H1556>run<s%> down as <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5158>stream.<s%>

Have you <S%H5066>offered<s%> to me <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H4503>offerings<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

But you have <S%H5375>borne<s%> the <S%H5522>tabernacle<s%> of your <S%H4432>Moloch<s%> and <S%H3594>Chiun<s%> your <S%H6754>images,<s%> the <S%H3556>star<s%> of your <S%H430>god,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H6213>made<s%> to yourselves.

Therefore will I cause you to go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
